This repository hosts the web tool. It's scope covers multiple public and private repositories at <https://github.com/2DegreesInvesting>:

```{r cache=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
pacta_find <- function(pacta_id = params$pacta_id) {
  # Assume pacta repositories are under the same parent directory
  siblings <- fs::dir_ls("..", regexp = pacta_id, recurse = TRUE, all = TRUE)
  fs::path_file(fs::path_dir(siblings))
}
```

```{r}
pacta_find()
```

This repository `r fs::path_file(here::here())` is the most closely related to "PACTA". The main file is "`r params$main_file`"; source it to produce inputs to other, dependent parts of the web-tool ecosystem:

```{r echo=FALSE}
source(params$main_file, echo = TRUE)
```
